const API_URL="https://script.google.com/macros/s/AKfycbwhWbKvqTNiUaq_Ws5I2MEbdf2HGls8IIsyMKcE8dcRvrLGXWsiqgG0SJstGzrd39yhtg/exec";// <-- PON TU DEPLOYMENT REAL
export async function apiRequest(payload){const params=new URLSearchParams();Object.entries(payload).forEach(_ref=>{let[k,v]=_ref;return params.append(k,v);});const res=await fetch(API_URL,{method:"POST",body:params});return await res.json();}
